mapper.select: SELECT GUID, CLASSFK, MANDATORY, WITHFIELD, WITHDATE, UESEXTENDNUMBER, FIELDNAME, FIELDLENGTH, ISNUMBERING, CREATETIME, CREATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID FROM MA_CLASS_NUMBER A

SELECT GUID, CLASSFK, MANDATORY, WITHFIELD, WITHDATE, UESEXTENDNUMBER, FIELDNAME, FIELDLENGTH, ISNUMBERING, CREATETIME, CREATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID FROM MA_CLASS_NUMBER A WHERE GUID=#GUID#
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MA_CLASS_NUMBER (GUID, CLASSFK, MANDATORY, WITHFIELD, WITHDATE, UESEXTENDNUMBER, FIELDNAME, FIELDLENGTH, ISNUMBERING, CREATETIME, CREATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID ) VALUES(#GUID:VARCHAR#, #CLASSFK:VARCHAR#, #MANDATORY:VARCHAR:NULL#, #WITHFIELD:VARCHAR:NULL#, #WITHDATE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #UESEXTENDNUMBER:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FIELDNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FIELDLENGTH#, #ISNUMBERING:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL# )
mapper.update:
UPDATE MA_CLASS_NUMBER
UPDATEUSERGUID = #UPDATEUSERGUID#, UPDATETIME =#CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, CLASSFK=#CLASSFK#, MANDATORY=#MANDATORY#, WITHFIELD=#WITHFIELD#, WITHDATE=#WITHDATE#, UESEXTENDNUMBER=#UESEXTENDNUMBER#, FIELDNAME=#FIELDNAME#, FIELDLENGTH=#FIELDLENGTH#, ISNUMBERING=#ISNUMBERING#,
WHERE GUID = #GUID#
